response.overview: Manny, Diego, and Sid embark upon another adventure after their continent is set adrift. Using an iceberg as a ship, they encounter sea creatures and battle pirates as they explore a new world.
response.tagline: The end of the world is just the tip of the iceberg.
response.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift

titles.title: A Era do Gelo 4: Deriva Continental
Ice Age 4 La formacion de los continentes
L'Âge de glace 4 : La Dérive des continents
アイス・エイジ４　パイレーツ大冒険
Kỷ Băng Hà 4: Lục Địa Trôi Dạt
